pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3-2130
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intergrated Graphics
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Can work on much weaker hardware, not tested though, use the settings.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 4300G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Graphics
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Tested on this hardware and known to work
